findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows an unauthorized user to upgrade the script, potentially leading to malicious behavior.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The internal _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential asset loss.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The safeTransferFrom function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The safeIncreaseAllowance function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized allowance increases.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function lacks protection against unauthorized access or malicious activities.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The internal _mint function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The internal _burn function lacks protection and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function lacks proper protection, potentially leading to unauthorized approvals.

findings.title: Unprotected _setupDecimals function
findings.description: The internal function _setupDecimals has no access modifier and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: _beforeTokenTransfer function is not protected and can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected sendValue function
findings.description: The sendValue function does not have any protection mechanism, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected functionCall function
findings.description: The functionCall function is unprotected and can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected functionCallWithValue function
findings.description: The functionCallWithValue function is unprotected and can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected functionStaticCall function
findings.description: The functionStaticCall function is unprotected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected functionDelegateCall function
findings.description: The functionDelegateCall function is unprotected and can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy in renounceOwnership function
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function may be vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy in transferOwnership function
findings.description: The transferOwnership function may be vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected safeTransfer function
findings.description: The safeTransfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected safeTransferFrom function
findings.description: The safeTransferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected safeApprove function
findings.description: The safeApprove function is unprotected and can lead to unauthorized approval of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected safeIncreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The safeIncreaseAllowance function lacks protection against potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected safeDecreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The safeDecreaseAllowance function lacks proper protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _callOptionalReturn function
findings.description: The _callOptionalReturn function is unprotected and can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected setupPool function
findings.description: The setupPool function is declared as external and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized modifications.

findings.title: Unprotected startStaking function
findings.description: The startStaking function lacks access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected setRewardPerBlock function
findings.description: The setRewardPerBlock function can be called by anyone, allowing unauthorized users to modify the reward per block.

findings.title: Unprotected setLockupDuration function
findings.description: The setLockupDuration function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the lockup duration.

findings.title: Unprotected setStakeMinimum function
findings.description: The setStakeMinimum function can be called by anyone, including unauthorized users, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Unprotected updatePool function
findings.description: The updatePool function is declared as internal and does not have any access modifiers, making it potentially vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected deposit function
findings.description: The deposit function is accessible without any access control or restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected withdraw function
findings.description: The withdraw function does not have any access control or validation checks, allowing anyone to withdraw funds.

findings.title: Unprotected claim function
findings.description: The claim function is public and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Unprotected safeRewardTransfer function
findings.description: The safeRewardTransfer function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected depositRewardReserve function
findings.description: The depositRewardReserve function lacks access control and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized reward reserve deposits.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawRewardReserve function
findings.description: The withdrawRewardReserve function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to withdraw reward reserves.
